name: Vacation Tycoon
summary:
Build the world's most fabulous vacation resort and go from luxurious to ludicrous!

Redefine what "Vacation" means as you restore your chain of failing resorts and take them from luxurious to ludicrous! In the most literal IDLE game of all time, you will fill your island paradise with the most over-the-top amenities to thrill and delight your visitors. Staffed with the wildest team of managers around, from squids and cyborgs to gurus and ghosts, your vacation destination literally has it all!
